title: Vendor
description: The JSON sub-schema for a vendor object. Endpoint - https://api.route4me.com/api/v1/vendors

id.title: Records Total
id.description: Total number of the returned records

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: When was updated a vendor's account

is_readonly.title: Is Readonly
is_readonly.description: If equal to 1, a vendor's account is readonly

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of a vendor's account

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: When was created a vendor's account

is_integrated.title: Is Integrated
is_integrated.description: If true, the vendor is integrated into the system

is_enabled.title: Is Enabled
is_enabled.description: If equal to 1, the vendor is enabled

hint.title: Hint
hint.description: Hint text for a vendor's account

website_url.title: Website URL
website_url.description: The website URL, of a vendor

is_required.title: Is Required
is_required.description: If true, the credential is required
